commands.name: ls
commands.help: Lists the contents of the specified directory. Use -a to show hidden files.

commands.name: dir
commands.help: Lists the contents of the specified directory on Windows systems.

commands.name: pwd
commands.help: Displays the current working directory path.

commands.name: whoami
commands.help: Shows the username of the currently logged-in user.

commands.name: ps

parameters.name: aux
parameters.description: Show all processes with detailed info

commands.help: Lists currently running processes. Use -aux for detailed information.

commands.name: tasklist
commands.help: Lists all running processes on Windows systems.

commands.name: netstat

parameters.name: an
parameters.description: Show all connections and listening ports

commands.help: Displays active network connections and listening ports.

commands.name: ifconfig
commands.help: Shows network interface configuration and IP addresses.

commands.name: ipconfig
commands.help: Displays IP configuration for all network adapters on Windows.

commands.name: load
commands.synopsis: Load new capabilities into the agent

parameters.name: capability
parameters.description: Name of the capability to load (e.g., Token_Impersonation, Cred_Harvesting)

commands.help: Loads a new capability module into the agent. Available capabilities include Token_Impersonation, Cred_Harvesting, Process_Injection, and others.

commands.name: capes
commands.help: Displays all capabilities currently loaded into the agent. Default capabilities include Loader, Console Execution, and Exit/Eat.

commands.name: agent_info
commands.help: Shows comprehensive information about the agent including status, configuration, capabilities, and system details.

commands.name: remove
commands.synopsis: removes the agent from the listing and databse. DOES NOT FORCE EAT!

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: first 8 charaters of the Agent ID

commands.help: Removes the agent from the listing and databse. DOES NOT FORCE EAT!
